  33. from __future__ import with_statement
  35. __all__ = ('get_permission_codename', 'autodiscover',)
  37. def get_permission_codename(perm):
  38. """get permission codename from permission string
  40. Usage:
  41. >>> get_permission_codename(u"app_label.codename_model")
  42. u"codename_model"
  43. >>> get_permission_codename(u"app_label.codename")
  44. u"codename"
  45. >>> get_permission_codename(u"codename_model")
  46. u"codename_model"
  47. >>> get_permission_codename(u"codename")
  48. u"codename"
  49. >>> get_permission_codename(u"app_label.app_label.codename_model")
  50. u"app_label.codename_model"
  52. """
  53. try:
  54. perm = perm.split('.', 1)[1]
  55. except IndexError:
  56. pass
  57. return perm
  59. def autodiscover(module_name=None):
  60. """
  61. Auto-discover INSTALLED_APPS permissions.py modules and fail silently when
  62. not present. This forces an import on them to register any permissions bits
  63. they may want.
  65. """
  66. import copy
  67. from django.conf import settings
  68. from django.utils.importlib import import_module
  69. from django.utils.module_loading import module_has_submodule
  70. from permission.handlers import registry
  72. module_name = module_name or settings.PERMISSION_MODULE_NAME
  74. for app in settings.INSTALLED_APPS:
  75. mod = import_module(app)
  76. # Attempt to import the app's permissions module
  77. try:
  78. before_import_registry = copy.copy(registry._registry)
  79. import_module('%s.%s' % (app, module_name))
  80. except:
  81. # Reset the model registry to the state before tha last import as
  82. # this import will have to reoccur on the next request and this
  83. # could raise NotRegistered and AlreadyRegistered exceptions
  84. # (see #8254)
  85. registry._registry = before_import_registry
  87. # Decide whether to bubble up this error. If the app just
  88. # doesn't have an permissions module, we can ignore the error
  89. # attempting to import it, otherwise we want it to bubble up.
  90. if module_has_submodule(mod, module_name):
  91. raise
